mapper.insert: insert into bdaqm_total(session_id, mission_id, job_id, type, file_name, file_path, keyword, record_date, ismute_45s, mute_location, contact_time, check_status, check_accounts, person_is_problem, transfer_istrue, problem_describe, true_transfer_content, remark, data_update_time) values(#{sessionId},#{missionId},#{jobId},#{type},#{fileName},#{filePath},#{keyword},#{recordDate}, #{ismute45s},#{muteLocation},#{contactTime},#{checkStatus},#{checkAccounts}, #{personIsProblem},#{transferIstrue},#{problemDescribe},#{trueTransferContent}, #{remark},#{dataUpdateTime})
